title: Traditional Medicinals
author: Holistic B
description: Since 1974, we've been passionate about connecting people with the power of plants. Traditional Medicinals is an independent company that embraces sustainability, ingredient purity, and social and environmental activism.
cleaned_text: [ Why Wild Matters ](/blogs/ppj/on-the-wild-side) Did you know that wild plants are important ingredients in your food, cosmetics, medicine, and especially close to our hearts - herbal tea? As the demand for natural products continues...
